unnormalised: Probability toh mere sir ke upar se jata hai, bhai! Especially statistics. I mean, what's the chance I'll actually use Bayes' theorem in real life? 0.0001% maybe? Aaj kal toh sab AI/ML kar rahe hai, aur unme bhi ye sab numbers ka khel hai. My friend Rohan got 99 percentile in CAT exam using statistics. Samajh nahi aata, why we need to calculate the standard deviation when we can just use Excel.
normalised: Probability to mere sir ke upar se jata hai, bhai! Especially statistics. I mean, what's the chance I'll actually use Bayes' theorem in real life? zero point zero zero zero one percent maybe? Aaj kal to sab A-I slash M-L kar rahe hai, aur unme bhi ye sab numbers ka khel hai. My friend Rohan got ninety nine percentile in C-A-T exam using statistics. Samajh nahi aata, why we need to calculate the standard deviation when we can just use Excel.
